name: EPF Dating Sim [In Development]
description:
A Club Penguin fan visual novel.

It's lonely being new on Club Penguin. However, your new life takes you by surprise when you're asked to join the Elite Penguin Force! Now, not only do you have to figure out your way around, you find yourself picking a class and a lead to bond with! Can you move up the ranks, stop threats, and most importantly, hook up with your lead?

Currently Available (version 0.1):

Chapter 1! Get yourself acquainted with Club Penguin and the EPF before picking the class of your dreams!

Chapter 1 Features:

  • Playtime: 45 mins - 1 hour
  • Special CGs!
  • 2 secret endings!

Characters:

Dateable Leads:

Want more? Head over to epfdatingsim.tumblr.com for updates!
